alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 10:52PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Buffalo County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1052 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pleasanton, or 17 miles north of Kearney, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Poole around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gibbon and Shelton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 284 and 292. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
